name: One Bad Egg
description:
Hey everyone! The theme for this Weekly Game Jam was "Hatch an Egg". So here I am with a short 'odd one out' game where doing well allows for those eggs to hatch safely. I hope you all enjoy playing the game and I challenge you all to get the highest score! If you want to download and see the cute egg icon, there are Windows and Mac builds as well.

All of the soundeggects come from Soundsnap.com and the music was made by me.

The art for the egg on the title screen was done by the wonderful Eva Wierzbicki
